remarks: Value of the free monoid construction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)
statement:
frmdval.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdval.b $e |- ( I e. V -> B = Word I ) $.
frmdval.p $e |- .+ = ( ++ |` ( B X. B ) ) $.
frmdval $p |- ( I e. V -> M = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. } ) $.
